claims.object: produce independent effects when heterozygous/none of the genes is dominant over the other/where two or more alleles does not show

surface_layer.definition: A unit of heredity that is transferred from a parent to offspring and is held to determine some characteristic of the offspring.

deep_layer.mechanism: Genes encode proteins, which carry out cellular functions.

epistemic_metadata.source: Biology Questions and Answers Form 4 - High School Biology
